page.title: 09Employment in Sheerness
page.content: A feature of the{employment situation in Sheerness is that one in five adults is now out of{work.}More men than women are unemployed at the present time. The figures vary seasonally because there are more jobs available during the summer months when there is an increase in the {population}because of the influx of summer visitors. A local firm have declared their intention to sponsor ten unemployed in response to{government}requests which could lead to permanent employment. This opportunity will be for people over eighteen who have been unemployed for twelve months out of the last fifteen. Many young people leaving school will be compelled to go on the dole.
